## Public Member Functions

### lowerAsmOperandForConstraint() {#adaff9002688c9185afc9e8b0e2a46f88}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool InlineAsmLowering::lowerAsmOperandForConstraint (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Val, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Constraint, std::vector&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &gt; &amp; Ops, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Lower the specified operand into the Ops vector.

<code>Val</code> is the IR input value to be lowered <code>Constraint</code> is the user supplied constraint string <code>Ops</code> is the vector to be filled with the lowered operands 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if the lowering succeeds, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>

### lowerInlineAsm() {#a1c9cd272afbe2a9aaca46369f9e61b79}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool InlineAsmLowering::lowerInlineAsm (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp; CB, std::function&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt;(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &amp;Val)&gt; GetOrCreateVRegs) const</>}>
Lower the given inline asm call instruction <code>GetOrCreateVRegs</code> is a callback to materialize a register for the input and output operands of the inline asm.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if the lowering succeeds, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>
